attributes.action: The implementation of laws protecting British tradition, culture & customs.
attributes.additional_details:
It is important for the traditions and customs of a culture to be preserved. It is our history and our heritage that will be lost if we do not protect them. 
We respect the right for everyone to practise their faith and customs in a peaceful manner, however, the right to preserve British traditions needs to be outlined clearly within the law.
attributes.background:
As our nation grows and populations come together it is important that the tradition and culture of a country is not lost. 
With nativity plays, christmas greetings, & flag flying fast becoming a shameful act of the past it's high time our goverment implements measure to safeguard these traditions.

rejection.details:
We're not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. 
You could start a new petition calling on the Government or Parliament to do a specific thing.

Also, you will need to give your full name if you start a new petition.
